data.name: Movavi Video Editor 15 Plus - Travel Set
data.detailed_description:
Transform ordinary vacation videos into a totally awesome travel journal.
Bring back the memories of your last vacation with the help of themed stickers, titles, transitions, and music.

The set includes 4 themed packs:
  • Airport
  • Bohemian
  • Camping
  • Journal

Make video stories about the places you’ve visited, the wonders you’ve seen and the roads you’ve traveled. Add captions with your location or direction, make photos look like diary pages and have fun making themed intros with built-in images and music.

With this set, you get:
  • 150 titles
  • 45 transitions
  • 47 stickers
  • 18 backgrounds
  • 21 music samples

The set is compatible with Movavi Video Editor Plus.

data.short_description: Transform ordinary vacation videos into a totally awesome travel journal. Bring back the memories of your last vacation with the help of themed stickers, titles, transitions, and music.
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Dutch, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Russian

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® Vista/7/8/10 with up-to-date patches and service packs installed
  • Processor: Intel®, AMD®, or compatible processor, 1.5 GHz
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel® HD Graphics 2000, NVIDIA® GeForce® series 8 and 8M, Quadro FX 4800, Quadro FX 5600, AMD Radeon™ R600, Mobility Radeon™ HD 4330, Mobility FirePro™ series, Radeon™ R5 M230 or higher
  • Storage: 550 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Administrator permissions are required for installation

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X® 10.7 or higher
  • Processor: 64-bit Intel® processor
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel® HD Graphics 2000, NVIDIA® GeForce® series 8 and 8M, Quadro FX 4800, Quadro FX 5600, AMD Radeon™ R600, Mobility Radeon™ HD 4330, Mobility FirePro™ series, Radeon™ R5 M230 or higher
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Administrator permissions are required for installation
